name: Rabbit Master
description:
DESCRIPTION

One Halloween night a little boy ventured deep into the forest against his parents' caution. The boy, distracted by the ominous sounds and howling wind,  wasn't looking where he was going and fell into a pit deep beneath the forest floor. Where was he? How was he going to get out? But most importantly, what was that SOUND?! 

                     

CONTROLS

'A' 'D'
Control Player Character Left / Right

'W' 'S'
Ascend / Descend Stairs

'J'
Interact with the Environment / Objects

'K'
Hide / Unhide

                               

CREDITS

Teyanna Calabrese: 2D Interactive Assets, 2D Player Art, Player Animations, UI Art, Audio  (https://agirlcea.itch.io)

Jhon Gomez: Gameplay Programming, Core Mechanics, Level Design  (https://jhongomez.itch.io)

Ting  Ting: Project Manager, 2D Monster Art, Monster Animations, 2D Background Art, Level Design  (https://ting0405.itch.io/)
